Package index

All functions

findNearestNeighbors()
Find the approximate set of neighbors of each voxels.
nifti_df_to_SummarizedExperiment()
Convert NIfTI data.frame to a SummarizedExperiment
nifti_eBayes() eBayes_to_images()
Run `eBayes` on NIfTI Images
nifti_images_to_matrix()
Transform set of images to matrix
nifti_lmFit()
Run `lmFit` on NIfTI Images
nifti_local_moderated_t_stat()
Compute local moderated T-statistics
